sentences.sContent: So people will not feel the self-deprecation in the public occasions.
sentences.sContent_eng: So people will not feel the self-deprecation in the public occasions.
sentences.sCn: 这样人们在公共场合才不会觉得自我贬低。

sentences.sContent: Obama has great timing, and a sense of self-deprecation honed over years of making fun of his name and his ears.
sentences.sContent_eng: Obama has great timing, and a sense of self-deprecation honed over years of making fun of his name and his ears.
sentences.sCn: 奥巴马很会把握时机，而且很会自嘲，这是他多年来拿自己的名字和耳朵开玩笑磨练出来的。
